name: Easter Egg Bunny Runner
description:
Welcome to the ***Easter Egg Bunny Runner*** Game...

Help the cute bunny to collect easter eggs, letters and coins.
- The eggs are your collected points
- The letters waiting with a surprise for you
- And with the coins you can buy new bunnys

See how far you can go and get into the easter fun. Your Highscore will be presented by GameCenter.
Fun for all ages and Eggcellent time for all.

No further iAP!

We hope you enjoy our game...
dapion
